entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dalhousie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:58 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 2:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: E 17 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow with ice pellets this afternoon and with rain late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19 except minus 24 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 19 except minus 24 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
